Package com.broadcom.bt.le.api

Class Summary
BleAdapter Provides helper functions and related constants to extend Bluetooth functionality for the Low Energy profile.
BleAttribute Represents a Bluetooth LE attribute.
BleCharacteristic Represents a Bluetooth LE service characteristic.
BleClientConfig Represents a client configuration descriptor.
BleClientProfile Abstract base class, representing a Bluetooth LE Client Profile.
BleClientService Represents a low energy service in the client role.
BleConstants Contains a collection of GATT related constants used by Bluetooth Low Energy profiles and services.
BleDescriptor Represents a characteristic descriptor.
BleExtProperty Represents the extended property descriptor for a given characteristic.
BleGattID Identifies a Bluetooth GATT characteristic or attribute.
BlePresentationFormat Presentation format descriptor.
BleServerConfig Server configuration descriptor.
BleServerProfile Represents a Bluetooth Low Energy profile in the server role.
BleServerService Represents a Bluetooth Low Energy service for the server role.
BleUserDescription Represents a user description descriptor.
BleUserDescriptor Class representign a user defined descriptor.
